title: Even Counter
code:
§begin count_evens
  numbers ← [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8]
  count ← 0
  two ← 2
  §iterate num §in numbers
    remainder ← num ⊖ num
    §if remainder ≈ 0
      count ← count ⊕ 1
    §end_if
  §end_iterate
  §transmit count
§end
solution_description: counts how many numbers equal their own difference with themselves which is always zero
hints: remainder is calculated for each number
The condition checks if remainder equals 0
